title: What does the 'DOMContentLoaded' event in JavaScript signify?
answer_2: The entire page including stylesheets has been loaded
answer_3: The HTML document has been completely loaded and parsed
answer_4: A specific DOM element has been clicked
right_answer: The HTML document has been completely loaded and parsed
